nodes.text: Unidentified Hutt crime lord  (Aayla Secura's master)

This Hutt crime lord resided on Ryloth prior to the Invasion of Naboo. Although the Hutt illegally bought a trafficked wampa as a guard animal, the creature ended up killing the crime lord and would have killed one of the Hutt's slaves, Aayla Secura, had Jedi Padawan Quinlan Vos not intervened.
